SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The AbstractDAO class is a generic class that provides common methods for data access operations.
AddClient
Represents the GUI window for adding a client.
AddComanda
Represents the GUI window for adding a new order.
AddProduct
Represents the GUI window for adding a new product.
AgeValidator
Validator class to validate the age of a Client.
Client
The Client class represents a client entity with various properties such as ID, name, address, email, and age.
ClientBLL
Business logic class for managing Client objects.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides client-specific queries and operations.
Comanda
Represents a Comanda (order) in the system.
ComandaBLL
Business logic class for managing Comanda objects.
ComandaDAO
The ComandaDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides comanda-specific queries and operations.
ConnectionFactory
Singleton class for managing database connections.
Controller
The Controller class handles the interaction between the user interface (View) and the business logic layer (BLL).
DeleteClient
The DeleteClient class represents a JFrame for deleting a client.
DeleteComanda
The DeleteComanda class represents a JFrame for deleting a comanda.
DeleteProduct
The DeleteProduct class represents a JFrame for deleting a product.
DisplayAllClients
The DisplayAllClients class represents a JFrame for displaying all clients.
DisplayAllComanda
The DisplayAllComanda class represents a JFrame for displaying all orders.
DisplayAllProducts
Represents the GUI window for displaying all products.
EditClient
The EditClient class represents a JFrame for editing client information.
EditComanda
The EditComanda class represents a JFrame for editing order information.
EditProduct
The EditProduct class represents a JFrame for editing product information.
EmailValidator
Validator class to validate the email of a Client.
Employee
Represents an Employee in the system.
Pb4Listener
The Pb4Listener class is an ActionListener for handling events related to option Pb4 (Display All Products) in the ViewProductOp class.
Pb5Listener
The Pb5Listener class is an ActionListener for handling events related to option Pb5 (Go to Employee Management) in the ViewProductOp class.
Product
Represents a Product in the system.
ProductBLL
Business logic class for managing Product objects.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides product-specific queries and operations.
ReflectionExample
The ReflectionExample class provides a static method for retrieving properties of an object using reflection.
Start
The Start class is the entry point for the application.
StockValidator
Validator class to validate the stock of a Product.
Validator<T>
Interface for implementing validation logic.
View
The View class represents a login view in the presentation layer.
ViewClientOp
The ViewClientOp class represents a client operations view in the presentation layer.
ViewComandaOp
The ViewComandaOp class represents an order operations view in the presentation layer.
ViewEmployee
The ViewEmployee class represents an employee view in the presentation layer.
ViewProductOp
The ViewProductOp class represents a product operations view in the presentation layer.
